content:
Hi,
Does anyone know if Zulip can use phpCAS for SSO?
If this is possible, is there any instruction on this?
Thank you so much. :)
@jcheng I'm not familiar with phpCAS but it can very likely be used with https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/authentication-methods.html#apache-based-sso-with-remote-user
